author: Nick Nairn
method: Heat the sesame oil in a wok over a low heat. Add the garlic and lemongrass and fry for 3-5 minutes. Add the vegetable stock and salmon pieces. Bring to the boil, then reduce the heat to simmer gently for 5-10 minutes, or until the salmon is cooked.  Add the noodles and stir well. To serve, pour the broth into a bowl and add the lime wedges.
ingredients: 1 tsp sesame oil,  1 garlic clove, chopped,  ½ stick lemongrass, outer leaves discarded, finely chopped,  300ml/10½fl oz hot vegetable stock,  100g/3½oz salmon fillet, cubed,  55g/2oz ready-made thin rice noodles, cooked according to packet instructions,  2 lime wedges
